title: Lamar Jackson Tests Positive as the Ravens Outbreak Tests the NFL
sub_head: Baltimore’s game against the Pittsburgh Steelers was already postponed, and getting the game in shows the high-wire act of smoothly finishing the NFL season
body:
For weeks, the NFL withstood rapidly rising Covid-19 case totals—within the country and in its own ranks—without any severe disruptions. Until Thanksgiving.
That’s when the sport’s reigning most valuable player, Baltimore Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson, reportedly tested positive as part of a growing outbreak inside a team that forced the postponement of the prime time Thursday night game against the Pittsburgh Steelers.
Four...
